materials_name: albumen (egg white protein) albumen paper paper (fiber product)
physical_appearance: This is a photograph of a group of dacoits. There are five men in the photograph, seated in two rows. All of them have their hair tied in a bun, and are dressed in a loose pair of shorts tied around the waist. They are all gazing to the right of the photograph. There is a window with bars behind the group. The man on the extreme right is marked with an 'X' below him. The title is written at the bottom, below the photograph.
title_text: Photograph album of views and portraits in the Punjab, Cashmere, Ceylon, Burma, Penang, Singapore, and Java Dacoits, Col: Hamilton's Murderers, 1875, Rangoon
subject_terms_2: Photographs Portrait photography Thomson, J. (John), 1837-1921 Dacoits
